sourcesContent:
<form [formGroup]="clothingForm" (ngSubmit)="onSubmit()">
    <!-- Champs du formulaire -->
    <input formControlName="name" placeholder="Nom">
    <input formControlName="description" placeholder="Description">
    <input formControlName="image_url" placeholder="URL de l'image">
    <input formControlName="category_id" placeholder="ID de Catégorie">
    <input formControlName="user_id" placeholder="ID d'Utilisateur">
    <button type="submit">Ajouter</button>
</form>
